## Description {#details}

A static registration template.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> like such:

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registry/add">Registry&lt;Collector&gt;::Add&lt;FancyGC&gt;</a> X(&quot;fancy-gc&quot;, &quot;Newfangled garbage collector.&quot;);

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> of this template requires that:


<ul>
<li>The registered subclass has a default constructor.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 126 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/registry-h">Registry.h</a>.
